pullRequest.title: JDT LS tests fail randomly
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #1450
The ClasspathUpdateHandlerTest.testClasspathUpdateForMaven test was failing because m2e updates a classpath when downloading a source artifact.
The ClasspathUpdateHandlerTest.testClasspathUpdateForGradle test isn't configured correctly.
The WrapperValidatorTest.testGradleWrapper test was starting more connections than allowed by Jenkins.
Signed-off-by: Snjezana Peco snjezana.peco@redhat.com

nodes.bodyText: I'd rather prefer we kept those temporary files under the target/ dir
I'd like to know why exactly this is happening. Is it expected we get multiple calls?

nodes.bodyText: need to also call WrapperValidator.clear() in setProperty(), as previous Gradle tests might have mutated  WrapperValidator's state
I saw this fail if WrapperValidator.clear() is not set in setProperty()
